title: Nate & Jeremiah by Design
resume: Balancing their roles as design experts and dads, Nate Berkus and Jeremiah Brent show us how to turn a money pit into a masterpiece. In each episode we learn from the mistakes of their clients as these designer husbands rescue them from renovation nightmares.
